welcome_title: We are the best company for your visit
welcome_description: After decades of experience, and a whole life in Lucca, we offer you the most complete tourism service in the city. In addition to having bikes and rickshaws to have as much fun as you want, you have the choice of tour guides with whom to tour and drivers for your every need. We offer packages in the way that you get the most at the lowest price. Book with us and we will always be available for you!
special_offers_title: Get Special Offers for Your Next Adventure
special_offers_description: After decades of experience, we offer exclusive deals for individuals, families, and organizations. Book with us and enjoy the best prices in town!
offer_groups_desc: Automatic 25% off for groups of 10+ people
offer_early_desc: Book 30+ days ahead for automatic 15% savings
offer_package_desc: Use code for 20% off your booking

testimonial_quote_1: But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure.

testimonial_quote_3: Honestly, I haven't found a better service in the city. The bikes are modern and comfortable, and the private transfer service was always on time. Thank you for making our trip seamless.
testimonial_quote_4: The tour we took in the countryside was absolutely fantastic! We enjoyed every minute, especially the kids. Guaranteed support is exactly what we were looking for.
